name: Bounty City: 3-Way Battle
description:
Game Overview
Bounty City, a VR FPS game that pits three teams against each other, is a VR game that maximizes the excitement and unpredictability of FPS gameplay with the unique concept of a three-way battle.

Here are some of the unique experiences you’ll get from Bounty City
- Gameplay: The game is basically played with 3 teams: 1 defense and 2 offense. The defense team must hide and protect a money bag (bounty). The offense teams must capture the hidden money bag and return it to their respective bases, or eliminate all players to win the round.
- Competitive play: With three teams competing, the stakes are even higher. Each team must keep an eye on the actions of the other two teams as they battle to capture or protect a planted money bag. Teamwork becomes more important, including balancing offense and defense, and making quick decisions to support or engage.
- Over the course of nine rounds (each round is three minutes long), each team must quickly determine which team is a threat and which team is an opportunity in an ever-changing situation to tip the game in their favor.
